column2: we had Walu Walu- escolar in Ponzu sauce.  It had a crunchy seared outer
column4: very tasty and one of my favorites.  Next was the foie gras sashimi- it melted in our mouthes incredible fusion of flavor
column6: an oak-grilled chicken breast with  lemon­grass and cilantro (this was really good
column7: and a safe bet for those not adventuresome).
